overview: This animation based on motion land, also used by Kiwerski in his earlier film People of Israel Went into the Midst of the Red Sea on Dry Ground, illustrates dynamic movement, intrinsic to the course of history. Mass, which undergoes constant change creating and destroying new shapes at the same time, is the protagonist here. The Rolling Stones is a symbolic interpretation of civilisations, which rise and collapse, and eventually a reflection on the impermanence of the human fate and empires built by man.
title: The Rolling Stones
